level.text: A person shall apply for a health inspection certificate with the information and documents required by, and pursuant to the procedures of, the DOH Director. The DOH Director may require that a vendor submit to DOH the business address of the supplier of all prepared foods that the person intends to vend as required in Chapter 37, Subtitle A (Food and Food Operations) of Title 25 of the DCMR.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 7787 (December 2, 1994); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 13055 (September 20, 2013).
